com.yahoo.gondola.container

Interface RegistryClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZookeeperRegistryClient

    public interface RegistryClient

    The Registry client interface, which talks to a registry service.

    Registration Process 
         Config config = new Config(new File("gondola.conf"));
     RegistryClient registry = RegistryClients.createZookeeperClient(config);
     registry.addListener(registry -> {});
     InetAddress address = getGondolaAddress();
     URL serviceUri = getServiceUri();
     String siteId = getSiteId();
     String hostId = registry.register(address, siteId, serviceUri);
     registry.waitForClusterComplete(-1);

     Gondola gondola = new Gondola(config, hostId);
     gondola.start();
    Get entries 
         List<Entry> entries = registry.getEntries();

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RegistryClient.Entry
      The host entry in this registry.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        String register(String siteId,
                InetSocketAddress gondolaAddress,
                URI serviceUri)
         throws IOException
        Register for a hostId in specific site.
        Parameters:
        siteId - The siteId of the host.
        gondolaAddress - Gondola ip:port that used for inter gondola communication.
        serviceUri - This URI represents the URL prefix to use when forwarding requests to this node.
        Returns:
        registered hostId for gondola.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • addListener

        void addListener(Consumer<RegistryClient.Entry> observer)
        Add registryChangeHandler for host list changes.

      • getEntries

        Map<String,RegistryClient.Entry> getEntries()
        Get registry map.
        Returns:
        A map of entries, key is the hostId.

      • waitForClusterComplete

        boolean waitForClusterComplete(int timeoutMs)
                        throws IOException
        Causes the current thread to wait until other nodes joined the cluster, or the specified waiting time elapses.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMs - if timeout < 0, means infinite.
        Returns:
        success if all required nodes join the cluster
        Throws:
        IOException
